name: Point Coin
description: Point Coin is an application with its own wallet, optimized for payment economy, and built around a wallet, payment function, and rewards. Basically, in order to utilize the payment, you can purchase POINT coins used as the key currency through purchases, rewards, purchases and swaps in the Point Coin platform on a listed exchange. Compared to existing payment systems, we want to establish ourselves as the next generation of payment through a low-cost, reasonable payment environment, fast payment processing speed, and a stable, transparent, and objective blockchain system.
